company_overview: Blum offers a decentralized crypto trading platform built within a Telegram mini-app and a standalone app. The company enables multichain token trading across centralized and decentralized exchanges using tools like a trading terminal, Memepad, and AI-driven bots. It also facilitates token launches and manages live operations for its native $BLUM utility token. The platform provides digital tools for real-time market interaction, token farming mechanics, and integration within the TON ecosystem.

Blum's presence at interzum 2025 reflects its ongoing commitment to delivering innovative, sustainable, and value-driven solutions. Plum is proud to announce that it has been named a winner of the Gold Technology Industry Disruptor at the 5th Annual 2025 Globee® Awards for Disruptors. Plum stood out among global innovators for redefining what it means to understand and nurture talent in the modern workforce. Built to transcend traditional pre-hire assessments, Plum equips organizations to prioritize durable soft skills. With insights grounded in I/O psychology and advanced behavioral data, Plum helps businesses unlock the full potential of their talent pools. The 2025 winners represent the spirit of disruption that’s shaping the future of business. “These innovators are not just responding to change—they are creating it,” said San Madan, President of the Globee® Awards. See the complete list of 2025 winners here: https://globeeawards.com/disruptor/winners. Plum is an award-winning talent assessment company. The company focuses on the core competencies that matter. Plum's award programs include the Globee Awards for Innovation, Cybersecurity and Women in Business. To learn more about Plum, visit: http://www.plum.io. Vladimir Smerkis, the co-founder of Blum, has been detained in Russia. He was arrested on accusations of large-scale fraud, according to local media reports. Blum is a popular Telegram Mini App that combines a crypto exchange with point-earning games. The official charges have yet to be revealed. Blum launched its "Drop Game" in May, 2024, which lets users farm "Blum Points" The project promised an eventual airdrop to turn Blum Points into tokens.
